title: Custom Skins how to modify wxy files
body: i have a wxy file with no sound effects i want to add it so how can i edit the wxy file help please

replies.body: Third party programs and modifications are not something we support, and doing so is at your own risk.  We wouldn't be able to offer support if something went wrong, or hidden content within those apps.  Check out our [stance on third party programs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and modifications for some more information, and make your decision for there.  Hope that helps!
i think skin preview doesnt do anything like that no jg timers no global ult thingy and anything else
can i use skin preview there is no jg timers it just change skin nothing else and just for us to see shld i download it
